title: Notification is generated for players that are not Active or Active Pending Contract (ignoring last three days)
custom_preconds: GIVEN that there is a date on which a Player has earned MJ stats less then 12 ago and more than 3 days ago
custom_steps: WHEN I create a place on Designate for Assignment or Release transaction for this playerAND back-date it so that the placement is before the player earned statsAND approve the transactionAND run the verify stats batch on this player
custom_expected: THEN a notification is generated

title: Notifictions are generated for players that were on the Restricted List within the past 3 days
custom_preconds: GIVEN that there is a date on which a Player has earned MJ stats less then 3 days ago
custom_steps: WHEN I create a place on Restricted List transaction for this playerAND back-date it so that the placement is before the player earned statsAND approve the transactionAND run the verify stats batch on this player
custom_expected: THEN a notification is generated

title: Notifications are generated for players on Rehab Assignemnt earning MJ stats
custom_preconds: GIVEN that there is a date on which a Player has earned MJ stats less then 12 ago and more than 3 days ago
custom_steps: WHEN I create a place on DL transaction for this playerAND back-date it so that the placement is before the player earned statsAND approve the transactionAND create and approve a Rehab Assignment transaction for the same dateAND run the verify stats batch on this player
custom_expected: THEN a notification is generated

title: Generated notifications appear for BOC and Club
custom_preconds: GIVEN that there is a notification generated by the stats batch
custom_steps: WHEN I view the BOC's notification widgetAND when I view the affected Club's notification widgetAND when I view a different Club's notfication widget (one not affected by the notification item in question)
custom_expected: THEN the notification appears in the BOC's and affected Club's widgetAND does not appear in the non-affected club's widget

title: Only one copy of each notification is generated
custom_preconds: GIVEN that there is a notification generated by the stats batch for MJ stats
custom_steps: WHEN I view the BOC's notification widgetAND when I view the relevant Clubs notification widget
custom_expected: THEN the notification appears once

title: Notifications are not generated for the previous 3 days
custom_preconds: GIVEN that there is a date on which a Player has earned MJ stats less then 3 days ago
custom_steps: WHEN I create a place on DL transaction for this playerAND back-date it so that the placement is before the player earned stats, but less than 3 days agoAND approve the transactionAND run the verify stats batch on this player
custom_expected: THEN no notifications are generated

title: Notifications are not generated for a player that is Active
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that there is a date on which a Player has earned MJ stats less then 12 ago and more than 3 days ago

AND that player has had an ML roster status of Active during at least one of those dates
custom_steps: WHEN I run the Verify Stats Batch on this player
custom_expected: THEN no notifications are generated for the dates on which he was Active

title: Notifications are not generated for a player that is Active Pending Contract
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that there is a Date on which a Player has earned MJ stats less then 12 ago and more than 3 days ago

AND that player has an Approved MJ contract
custom_steps:
WHEN I create an Terminate Contract under P 7(a) transaction for him 
AND date it the day before the Date on which he earned stats
AND approve
AND create a new Sign Free Agent to Major League Roster transaction for the same Org
And date it on the Date on which he earned stats
AND Approve
AND run the verify stats batch on this player
custom_expected:
THEN no notifications are generated for the Date on which he earned stats but was Active Pending Contract for his roster status
AND the only notification generated will warn that the player requires an MJ contract

title: Notifications are not generated for players that have a pending roster status of Active
custom_preconds: GIVEN that there are at least TWO dates on which a Player has earned MJ stats less then 12 ago and more than 3 days ago
custom_steps:
WHEN I create a place on Place on Paternity List Transaction for this player

AND back-date it so that the placement is the day before the player earned stats

AND approve the transaction

AND create and submit a Reinstate from IL transaction for him, dated at least one day after the placement but on or before the player earned stats again

AND run the verify stats batch on this player


(For example:)
||| Date: |29|30|31|8/1|2| 3|4 (today)
|| Stats earned? | yes |  | yes |  |  | yes | yes
|| Roster Status: | Paternity List | Pat. List | Pat. List (Pending status = Active) | Pat. List (Pending status = Active) | Pat. List (Pending status = Active) | Pat. List (Pending status = Active)| Pat. List (Pending status = Active)
custom_expected:
THEN notifications are generated for the dates on which the player earned stats but was on the Paternity List

AND no notifications are generated for the dates on which the player earned stats but had a pending status of Active

title: Notification is generated for players that are not Active, Active Pending Contract, or an any kind of rehab assignment (ignoring the last 3 days)
custom_preconds: GIVEN that there is a Date on which a Player has earned MN stats less then 12 ago and more than 3 days ago
custom_steps:
WHEN I create a Place on Temporarily Inactive List for this player

AND back-date it so that the placement is before the player earned stats

AND approve the transaction

AND run the verify stats batch on this player
custom_expected: THEN a notification is generated for that Date

title: Notifications are generated for players that were on the Restricted List within the past 3 days
custom_preconds: GIVEN that there is a date on which a Player has earned MN stats less then 12 ago and more than 3 days ago
custom_steps: WHEN I create a place on Restricted List transaction for this playerAND back-date it so that the placement is before the player earned statsAND approve the transactionAND run the verify stats batch on this
custom_expected: THEN a notification is generated

custom_steps: WHEN I view the BOC's notification widgetAND when I view the affected Club's notification widgetAND when I view a different Club's notfication widget (one not affected by the notification item in question)
custom_expected: THEN the notification appears in the BOC's and affected Club's widgetAND does not appear in the non-affected club's widget

custom_preconds: GIVEN that there is a notification generated by the stats batch
custom_steps: WHEN I view the BOC's notification widgetAND when I view the relevant Clubs notification widget
custom_expected: THEN the notification appears once

title: Notifications are not generated for players that have a pending roster status of MJ Rehab 60 Day DL
custom_preconds: GIVEN that there are at least two Dates (Day 1 and Day 2) on which a Player has earned MN stats less then 12  days ago and more than 3 days ago
custom_steps:
AND when I create a Selection to ML Roster for him
AND date it on Day 1
AND approve
AND then I create an MJ Place on 60 Day DL transaction for him
AND date it on Day 2
AND approve
AND then I create an MJ Rehab Assignment for him
AND date it on Day 2
AND submit
WHEN I run the Verify Stats batch on him
custom_expected: THEN no notifications are generated for the player about Day 2

AND date it on Day 1
AND approve
AND then I create an MJ Place on 10 Day DL transaction for him
AND date it on Day 2
AND approve
AND then I create an MJ Rehab Assignment for him
AND date it on Day 2
AND submit
WHEN I run the Verify Stats batch on him
custom_expected: THEN no notification is generated about the player's roster status for day 2

title: Notifications are generated for players earning stats with a different club (ignoring the past 2 days)
custom_preconds: GIVEN that there is a date on which a Player has earned stats less then 4 days ago and more than 2 days ago
custom_steps:
WHEN I create a Transfer tx assigning this player to another MN club

AND back-date it so it is on that day

AND approve

AND the batch is run on this player
custom_expected: THEN a notification is generated for that date

title: Notifications are not generated for players that have earned stats with their pending club
custom_preconds: GIVEN that there is a date on which a Player has earned stats less then 4 days ago and more than 2 days ago
custom_steps:
WHEN I create a Transfer tx assigning this player to another MN club

AND back-date it so it is on that day

AND submit

AND the batch is run on this player
custom_expected: THEN no notifications are generated for that date

title: Generated notifications appear for BOC and Club
custom_preconds: GIVEN that there is a notification generated by the stats batch regarding a missing contract
custom_steps:
WHEN I view the BOC's notification widget

AND when I view the affected Club's notification widget

AND when I view a different Club's notfication widget (one not affected by the notification item in question)
custom_expected:
THEN the notification appears in the BOC's and affected Club's widget

AND does not appear in the non-affected club's widget

title: Only one copy of each notification is generated
custom_preconds: GIVEN that there is a notification generated by the stats batch regarding a missing contract
custom_steps:
WHEN I view the BOC's notification widget

AND when I view the relevant Clubs notification widget
custom_expected: THEN the notification appears once

title: Notifications are not generated for the past 2 days
custom_preconds: GIVEN that there is a date on which a Player has earned MN stats less than 2 days ago
custom_steps:
WHEN I create a Transfer tx assigning this player to another MN club

AND back-date it so it is on that day

AND submit

AND the batch is run on this player
custom_expected: THEN no notifications are generated for that date

title: Notification is generated when players earns MJ stats without an Active contract for that Club
custom_preconds: GIVEN that there is a date on which a Player has earned MJ stats less then 12 ago and more than 3 days ago
custom_steps:
WHEN I create a Player Terminates Contract under Paragraph 7(a) transaction for this player

AND date it before the player earned stats

AND approve

AND create a new MJ contract for him with the same club from which he was released

AND date it on the same date as the contract termination

AND push it to Pending Approval state

AND run the Verify Stats batch on this player
custom_expected: THEN a notification is generated for the date on which the player earned stats but did not have an approved MJ contract

title: Generated notifications appear for BOC and Club
custom_preconds: GIVEN that there is a notification generated by the stats batch
custom_steps: WHEN I view the BOC's notification widgetAND when I view the affected Club's notification widgetAND when I view a different Club's notfication widget (one not affected by the notification item in question)
custom_expected: THEN the notification appears in the BOC's and affected Club's widgetAND does not appear in the non-affected club's widget

title: Only one copy of each notification is generated
custom_preconds: GIVEN that there is a notification generated by the stats batch
custom_steps: WHEN I view the BOC's notification widgetAND when I view the relevant Clubs notification widget
custom_expected: THEN the notification appears once

title: Notification is not generated when player elects free agency on the same day he earns stats
custom_preconds: GIVEN that there is a date on which a Player has earned MN stats less then 12 ago and more than 3 days ago
custom_steps:
WHEN I create a Elect Free Agency transaction for this player

AND date it ON the date player earned stats

AND approve

AND run the Verify Stats batch on this player
custom_expected: THEN no notifications are generated

title: Notification is generated when players earn MN stats without an Approved contract for that Club
custom_preconds: GIVEN that there is a date on which a Player has earned MN stats less then 12 ago and more than 3 days ago
custom_steps:
WHEN I create a Declare Minor League Free Agent transaction for this player

AND date it before the player earned stats

AND approve

AND create a new contract for him with a different club than he one from which he was released

AND push it to Terms Accepted state

AND run the Verify Stats batch on this player
custom_expected: THEN notifications are generated stating that the player is playing in the Minor Leagues without an Active Contract

title: Generated notifications appear for BOC and Club
custom_preconds: GIVEN that there is a notification generated by the stats batch
custom_steps: WHEN I view the BOC's notification widgetAND when I view the affected Club's notification widgetAND when I view a different Club's notfication widget (one not affected by the notification item in question)
custom_expected: THEN the notification appears in the BOC's and affected Club's widgetAND does not appear in the non-affected club's widget

title: Only one copy of each notification is generated
custom_preconds: GIVEN that there is a notification generated by the stats batch
custom_steps: WHEN I view the BOC's notification widgetAND when I view the relevant Clubs notification widget
custom_expected: THEN the notification appears once

title: Notification is not generated when players are on Rehab assignment without an Active contract for their rehab club
custom_preconds: GIVEN that there is a date on which an MJ Player has earned MN stats less then 12 ago and more than 3 days ago
custom_steps:
WHEN I create a place on DL transaction for this player

AND back-date it so that the placement is before the player earned MN stats

AND approve the transaction

AND create and approve a Rehab Assignment transaction for the same date

AND create a minor contract with the same club on the same date

AND push it to terms accepted

AND run the verify stats batch on this player
custom_expected: THEN no notifications are generated pertaining to the player's contract for that date

title: Notification is not generated when players have a pending Rehab assignment
custom_preconds: GIVEN that there is a date on which a Player has earned MN stats less then 12 ago and more than 3 days ago
custom_steps:
WHEN I create a place on DL transaction for this player

AND back-date it so that the placement is before the player earned stats

AND approve the transaction

AND create and submit a Rehab Assignment transaction for the same date

AND run the verify stats batch on him
custom_expected: THEN no notifications are generated for this player regarding contracts for that date

title: Notification is not generated when player is released on the same day he earns stats
custom_preconds: GIVEN that there is a date on which a Player has earned MN stats less then 12 ago and more than 3 days ago
custom_steps: WHEN I create a Declare Minor League Free Agent transaction for this playerAND date it ON the date player earned statsAND approveAND run the Verify Stats batch on this player
custom_expected: THEN no notifications are generated

title: As a BOC user I want to remove all instances of a notification for all users (including duplicates)
custom_preconds: GIVEN that there is a generated stat notification appearing on a club's and BOC's clipboard
custom_steps: WHEN a BOC user selects this notificationAND clicks ManageAND selects "Delete all existing entries"AND clicks Submit
custom_expected: THEN the notification will be removed from the BOC's and relevant Club's clipboard

title: As a BOC user I want to prevent a notification from being generated again for all users
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user has run the Verify Stats batch and generated a notification on the BOC and Club's clipboard
custom_steps: WHEN a BOC user selects this notificationAND clicks ManageAND selects "Delete all existing entries"AND selects "Stop sending this notification"AND clicks SubmitAND runs the Verify Stats batch again with the same parameters that generated the notification in question
custom_expected: THEN no notification is generated

title: No notifications should be generated for stats earned in the Mexican league
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that there is a player that was part of an Outright to Mexican League
AND is on a Mexican League Club
AND there is a Date on which this player earned stats with the Club this season
custom_steps:
WHEN I create a Declare Minor League Free Agency transaction 

AND back-date it so it is before the player earned stats but after the player was assigned to the Mexican League

AND approve the transaction

AND the batch is run on this player
custom_expected: THEN no notifications are generated for dates on which the player was assigned to the Mexican League

title: No notifications should be generated for stats earned in Post Season or All-Star games
custom_preconds: GIVEN that there is a date on which a Player has earned post-season stats less then 12 ago and more than 3 days ago
custom_steps: WHEN I create a place on DL transaction for this playerAND back-date it so that the placement is before the player earned statsAND approve the transactionAND run the verify stats batch on this player
custom_expected: THEN no notifications are generated
